-- Tiger New Tab --

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://tiger-newtab.com/terms and Privacy Policy https://tiger-newtab.com/privacy

Introducing Tiger New Tab: Transform Your Browsing Experience!

Revolutionize the way you browse with Tiger New Tab – the ultimate extension for Chrome users.

Unleash Your Inner Tiger:

Experience the thrill of the jungle with our unique cursor/mouse pointer, transformed into a majestic tiger icon. Let every click roar with power and excitement!

Seamless Integration, Enhanced Performance:

Tiger New Tab seamlessly integrates with your Chrome browser, offering lightning-fast performance and smooth navigation. Get ready to pounce on your favorite websites with unparalleled speed and efficiency.
